{{Wired embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=BeagleBoard |revision=xM (rev C) |asin=B00DK2C8GE |price=149 |est_release_date=04/2010 |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |flags=S-Video, DVI-D, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), GPIO, |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=DM3730 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_model=SD Card |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT46H128M32L2KQ-5 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Micro SD card slot |expansion_usb_num=5 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, P3 |serial=yes,, DB9,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9514;LAN9514-JZX; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1; ,,, Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;TI;TFP410PAP;;1; ,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2054BD;;1; ,,, USB Peripheral Power Management;Texas Instruments;TPS2141;;1; ,,, Integrated Power Management and Audio Codec;TI;TPS65950;;1; ,,, Overvoltage Protection Controller;ON Semiconductor;NCP349;;2; ,,, 2-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0102DCUR;;2; ,,, 3V to 5.5V Single Channel RS232 Transceiver;TI;SN65C3221;;1; ,,, Dual Buffer and Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC2G07;;1; ,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TL1963A;;2; ,,, Dual Inverter Buffer and Driver;TI;SN74LVC2G06;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;2011.12-00006;-gb1fd369; |stock_os=Linux;3.0.14;Angstrom v2012.01-core; |tp_firmware=Debian, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=''blank'' |oui_eth=2E:10:F5 }} :[https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm Product page]
*[https://elinux.org/Beagleboard:BeagleBoard-xM ''BeagleBoard-xM'' on '''eLinux'''] (Rev A2/A3/B/C/C1/C2)
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[TI]] AM3730 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) Processor *RAM: 512MB (LPDDR3), 2D/3D graphics accelerator *Connectivity: 4x USB 2.0 ports (Mini USB A/B) :MMC/SD Card slot, DVI-D, S-Video, Ethernet ports
The board can be powered by 2 different methods: *5V/2A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Mini-B (when powered via USB :the 4x USB Type A ports will not function) {{see also|List of SBCs}}
===See also=== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
